name: Austin Johnson
position: CEO / VJ / Graphic Designer / Web Developer
desc: Adhype Visuals founder Austin Johnson has been a VJ / visual designer for the last 10 years of his career. With a keen eye for design he has worked with clients and artists alike to bring their vision to life. His design experience has transferred into front end web development making designing UI and creating web applications a new passion.

name: Dex Honsa
position: Software Engineer / Visual Artist / Graphic Designer
desc: Dex has been working with Adhype Visuals since its inception. Being a Software Engineer and Designer for nearly 10 years Dex has a strong passion for design and all things creative. His raw musical talent gives him the ability to create a strong connection between the client's music and the visual content he creates.

name: Daniel Mashek
position: Project Manager / VJ / Video Engineer / LED Wall Technitian
desc: Daniel is a VJ, Project Manager, and Video Engineer that has been in the music industry for the last 10 years. With a passion for pixels and all things LED he has designed and deployed numerous creative led wall packages for touring artists. His strong attention to detail always ensures the event he is on goes off without a hitch.
